div.ab:
وضمانهم عن جميل الطّفل وحوز المشترية
بما فيــه وكتب بخطّه في تأريخه
وكتب شهادته بخطّه
حمدون بن ميمون بجميع ما ما فيه
عنه خضر بن عبــد

šahida ʿalà ḏālika ḫaḍiru bnu ʿabdi *** ʿalà ʾiqrāri
ʾabī ăl ʿabbāsi bi maʿrifati hi wa ǧamīʿi mā fī hāḏā
ăl kitābi ăṣ ṣadāqi wa kataba šahādata hu bi ḫaṭṭi hi
wa šahida ḥamdūnu bnu maymūn:in bi ǧamīʿi mā fī hi
wa kataba ʿan hu ḫaḍiru bnu ʿabdi ***

(The following witnesses) have testified to it. Ḫ[aḍir b. ʿAbd ...... (is witness) to the acknowledgment]
by Abuʾl-ʿAbbâs that he has understood (it) and al[l that (is contained) in this]
agreement concerning the nuptial gift, and he has written [his testimony in his (own) handwriting].
Ḥamdûn b. Maimû[n] is witness [to all that (is contained) herein],
and Ḫaḍir b. ʿAb[d ...] has written (it) for him.
